      Gets a cached value, put there with CacheAccess.Client.putToCache(long, long...) or CacheAccess.Client.putToCacheSingle(long, int, long) and interpret field value as a boolean. 0 will be treated as false all the rest as true.

      • getFromCache

        public long getFromCache​(long id,
                         int slot)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Gets a cached value, put there with CacheAccess.Client.putToCache(long, long...) or CacheAccess.Client.putToCacheSingle(long, int, long).
        Specified by:
        getFromCache in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id this cached value is tied to.
        slot - which cache slot for this id.
        Returns:
        the cached value.

      • getBooleanFromCache

        public boolean getBooleanFromCache​(long id,
                                   int slot)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Gets a cached value, put there with CacheAccess.Client.putToCache(long, long...) or CacheAccess.Client.putToCacheSingle(long, int, long) and interpret field value as a boolean. 0 will be treated as false all the rest as true.
        Specified by:
        getBooleanFromCache in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id this cached value is tied to.
        slot - which cache slot for this id.
        Returns:
        false if slot value is 0, true otherwise.

      • putToCache

        public void putToCache​(long id,
                       long... values)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Caches all values for an id, i.e. fills all slots.
        Specified by:
        putToCache in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id these cached values will be tied to.
        values - the values to cache, one per slot.

      • putToCacheSingle

        public void putToCacheSingle​(long id,
                             int slot,
                             long value)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Caches a single value for an id and slot.
        Specified by:
        putToCacheSingle in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id this cached values will be tied to.
        slot - the slot for the given id.
        value - the value to cache for this id and slot.

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache​(long index)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Clears the cached values for the specified id.
        Specified by:
        clearCache in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        index - the entity id to clear the cached values for.

      • withinBounds

        public boolean withinBounds​(long id)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Some consistency check stages splits the id range into segments, one per thread. That split is initiated by CacheAccess.prepareForProcessingOfSingleStore(long) and checker, per thread, using this method.
        Specified by:
        withinBounds in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        id - the record id to check whether or not to process for this thread.
        Returns:
        true if the thread represented by this client should process the record of the given id, otherwise false.

      • putPropertiesToCache

        public void putPropertiesToCache​(Collection<PropertyRecord> properties)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Caches a Collection of PropertyRecord for later checking.
        Specified by:
        putPropertiesToCache in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        properties - property records to cache for this thread.

      • getPropertiesFromCache

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        cached properties.

      • getPropertyFromCache

        public PropertyRecord getPropertyFromCache​(long id)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess.Client
        Gets a cached PropertyRecord of a specific id, see CacheAccess.Client.putPropertiesToCache(Collection).
        Specified by:
        getPropertyFromCache in interface CacheAccess.Client
        Parameters:
        id - the property record id to look for.
        Returns:
        cached PropertyRecord id, or null if not found.
